page.title: 20Grandparents in 1985
page.content: My Grandma and Grandad usually get up about 9.30am.They always have toast and marmalade or lemon curd and cornflakes for breakfast.After breakfast Grandma starts cleaning the house and Grandad goes to get the bread and a "Daily Express" from the shops up the road. Then Grandad sits down and reads the paper.At about 11.00am Grandma and Grandad start to cook the lunch they nearly always have Yorkshire pudding, meat ,potatoes,carrots and gravy for lunch and for afters they have either apple pie or rice pudding.After lunch they go for a walk.In the afternoon they just take it easy.Grandad watches sport and Grandma knits.At 3.00pm they have tea and then they watch T.V. until 10.00pm then they have supper and go to bed at about 10.30pm.
